title: PeerMessageSubmit
description: Peer-to-peer message submission request for agent communication.

messageId.description: Optional message identifier. If not provided, will be auto-generated.

payload.description: Message payload content. Maximum 65536 bytes when UTF-8 encoded. Note: maxLength is a character-length cap; true byte-length validation occurs at runtime.

replyTo.description: Optional callback endpoint URL to receive replies.
